chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello we are going to start on the island in the upper right corner
Hello! So, I see that we are starting on an island in the upper right corner of the map. Can you provide me with the next instruction to proceed?
Next, go diagonally down to the left through the tiger island and onto the parrot and elephant island

Got it! I'll go diagonally down to the left through the tiger island and onto the parrot and elephant island. 

I have reached the parrot and elephant island. What is the next instruction?
On the current parrot island, take a route that goes up and around the parrot, and circles around until exiting diagonally down towards the right which is the frog island

Alright, I will take a route that goes up and around the parrot and circles around until exiting diagonally down towards the right, leading to the frog island.

I have reached the frog island. What is the next instruction?
take a path that goes towards and then under the frog, then do a u-turn and head back this time towards the alligator bridge

Okay, I will take a path that goes towards and then under the frog, and then do a u-turn to head back towards the alligator bridge.

I have reached the alligator bridge. What should I do next?
Exit the alligator bridge north, which is the parrot and elephant island, and head west over and on to giraffe island

Got it! I will exit the alligator bridge and head north, back to the parrot and elephant island. From there, I will head west over to the giraffe island.

I have reached the giraffe island. What would you like me to do next?
then take the coastline south and exit southeast towards the snake island which has the treasure

Alright, I will take the coastline south from the giraffe island and then exit southeast, heading towards the snake island where the treasure is located.

I have reached the snake island and found the treasure! *Finished!* Thank you for your instructions!

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hi there! Welcome to the map navigation game. Are you ready to start the journey?
yes

Great! Let's begin. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. To start your journey, please take a few steps to the left (west), passing below a wooden bench. Once you've done that, let me know.
ok i have done that

Fantastic! Now, after passing below the wooden bench, you should see a trail ahead. U-turn to your left and cross the trail back towards the white dog. Just near the dog, there is a wooden branch that crosses a river. Can you please describe what you see?
i see a white screen as the map image has disappeared

Apologies for the inconvenience. Let's continue with the verbal description. So, after crossing back over the trail, you should see a wooden branch that forms a bridge over a river. Can you visualize that?
yes I can

Great! You're doing well. Now, please cross over the wooden branch to the south and continue moving southwards (down the map). Along the way, you should see another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Let me know when you've reached there.
I have visualized this step, I am there next to a white checkered picnic

Fantastic! Now, the next step is to walk over a mat that's on the ground near the picnic. On the mat, there is a bowl of berries. Walk over the mat, touch the bowl of berries gently, and continue walking towards the west. Let me know when you've done that.
Ok I have followed your steps

Great job! Now, as you walk to the west, you will come across another wooden branch that crosses the river. Cross over the branch, this time going to the north. Once you've crossed the river, let me know.
Alight I have crossed the river

Perfect! Now that you've crossed the river, you'll see a green bush ahead. Instead of touching the bush, I want you to circle around it from the right side. Keep the bush on your left as you go around it, until you reach a florist stand. Let me know when you've reached the stand.
I am there now

Fantastic! Now, at the florist stand, I want you to turn left (west) and walk below the stand. As you do so, you will approach a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Once you reach the bridge, do not cross it. Let me know when you've reached below the bridge.
I am below the bridge now
Great job! Just past the bridge, you should see two elderly people sitting on a bench, reading newspapers. Take a moment to visualize that scene. Let me know when you're ready to proceed.
I am ready to move

Perfect! Now, from where you are, take a few steps south, passing between the two elderly people and another wooden branch. As you continue southwards, you will approach a green bush. Let me know once you're next to the green bush.
I am there now

Great! Almost there. Now, from the green bush, I want you to turn east and walk between the wooden branch and the bush. As you move east, keep an eye out for any changes in your surroundings. Let me know what you see as you walk.
Ok I have moved east and the surroundings have now changed
Excellent! You're doing great. A few steps to the east from where you are, you will spot a brown young deer. Congratulations! You have reached your final objective. Well done!
I reached the end, mentally, not visually as again, the image of the map has disappeared

Apologies for the technical difficulty and the inconvenience caused. But don't worry, you've successfully navigated the path and reached the brown young deer, which was the final objective of the journey. Well done! Thank you for playing the map navigation game. Feel free to play again anytime you like.
ok I am at the deer now, is the game over?

Yes, the game is over. Congratulations on successfully reaching the deer! You did an excellent job following the instructions and navigating the path. Thank you for playing the map navigation game. If you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with, please let me know.
how do we progress to the next map?

I apologize for any confusion. In this particular game, there is no progression to the next map. The objective was to successfully navigate the specific path I provided and reach the brown young deer. If you'd like to continue with another game or if there's anything else I can assist you with, please let me know.
can you refresh the image of the map?

I apologize for the inconvenience, but as a text-based AI, I don't have the capability to refresh or display images. I can only provide verbal instructions and guidance. If you have any questions or need assistance with anything else, please let me know and I'll be happy to help.

chat.msg: Welcome!
The starting point is a tent set up in the north of the map
Okay, I am at the starting point, which is a tent located in the north of the map. What should I do next?
take a path south from the test and navigate around a bush and dog that are sitting in the southward way

Got it! I will take the path south from the tent and navigate around a bush and a dog that are sitting in the way. 

I continue south past the tent, avoiding the bush and the dog. What's next?

Move along the path under the dog, eastward and then go around the campfire from the northside, but ultimately head back to the path from there, head east under mushrooms and towards a car that blocks the path

Great, I'm moving along the path from south of the dog and heading east. I continue along the path, passing under the dog and there I see a campfire. I go around the campfire from the north side and head back to the path.

Next, I head east under some mushrooms. From there, I come across a car blocking the path. What should I do next?

turn around from this spot, staying on the path and head south down the path, carefully passing around the edge of the telescope, leave the path and cut through the grass heading south and then west once under the telescope

Alright, I turn around from the spot where the car is blocking the path. I stay on the path and head south. 

As I walk down the path, I approach a telescope. I carefully pass around the edge of the telescope, still staying on the path.

After passing the telescope, you mentioned that I should leave the path and cut through the grass. So, I leave the path and head south through the grass. Once I am under the telescope, I turn west. 

What's the next step?
head west on that path and stay on the edge of the rock barrier as you head to the cabin

Got it! I start heading west on the path and stay on the edge of the rock barrier. As I move forward, I can see the cabin up ahead.

I continue to follow the path, keeping the rock barrier on my right side. Finally, I reach the cabin.

*Finished!* I have arrived at the wooden house. Is there anything else I should do here?

chat.msg: Welcome!
hello
Hello! Are you ready to navigate the map? Let's get started! Look around and tell me what you see near you.
first can I ask, how do i draw a line on the map to follow your directions

Great question! Since we're playing a dialogue-based game, you don't need to draw a line on the map. Just imagine the path and follow my instructions as we go along. Let's start by describing the area around you. What do you see near you?
I am to the right of 3 palm trees
Perfect, you're in the right place! Start by walking under the first palm tree towards the southwest. Let me know when you've reached the other side.
I am on the other side of the palm trees
Great! Now, turn right and continue straight, crossing the second palm tree. Keep going until you see a brown puppy on your left. Let me know when you spot the puppy.
alright I have made it to the puppy
Fantastic! From the puppy, make a slight left turn and then turn right to face south. Let me know when you're facing south.
ok i am facing south and looking at 2 big rocks with space in between
Perfect! Now, walk through the space between the big rock on your left and the small rock on your right. Once you've passed them, you should reach the water. Let me know when you're at the water.
ok i am at the beach between the 2 rocks
Great job! Now, step into the water and face a large red crab. Once you're facing the crab, turn right (west) and continue along the big rock in the water. Let me know when you've made the turn.
ok i have made the turn and I am on the coastline
Perfect! You're doing great! Continue west along the coastline, passing by a third medium-sized rock. Keep going until you see a shark in the water. Let me know when you spot the shark.
ok I see a shark on my left now

Great observation! Now, make a sharp right turn (north) to avoid the shark. Once you've made the turn, head back to the land and go between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball. Keep going north. Let me know when you've passed the rock and the ball.
ok I have passed by the rock and ball, facing north
Well done! Now, veer slightly left and head towards the northwest. You'll find a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Keep going between them. Let me know when you're through.
I have reached the spot between the two and I am facing a wall

Great job! Now, keep moving in an arc around the red tent and continue heading south towards the sea. But just when you reach the shore, make a right turn (west) and go below a red kayak that you'll find there. Let me know when you're below the kayak.
I am back at the coastline, below the kayak

Wonderful progress! Now, it's time to make a 90-degree right turn (north) and follow along the side of the kayak. Keep moving until you reach a small green bush. That's our final objective. Let me know when you've reached the small green bush.
i am there now

Congratulations! You've successfully reached the small green bush, our final objective. Well done on navigating the map! I hope you enjoyed the journey. If you'd like to play again or have any other questions, feel free to let me know.
